translator.translatorname: Mika Arita, Kazu 'Omi' Kajihara, Marcelluss D. Nealy

lyric.verse: Where did I put it off? I may have been barefoot from the beginning Stuffed with unnecessary knowledge, My little head is finally working My heart is finally alive Going through the thistle field, Growing the white madness inside my bare breast
lyric.chorus: White and white forever, deeply love you White and white forever, I'll be praying like this everyday
lyric.verse: I wonder where I got lost It might've taken too long to see you I don't need any heels My little wish will almost come true Though your shadow's still too far now Putting fire into the stove Hitting the silver nails for decorating you
lyric.chorus: Shave off you bones and skins, If you got dripped sweetly Shave off you bones and skins, I'll watch you and kiss you everyday White and white forever, deeply love you White and white forever, I'll be praying like this everyday
